title: Cackleberry Home Red and White Ticking Stripe Cafe Curtains 28 Inches W x 36 Inches L Woven Cotton, Set of 2
features: Set of two classic woven red and white ticking stripe cafe curtains

description: Classic woven red and white ticking stripe cafe curtains. Set of 2 panels - each measures 28 inches wide by 36 inches long. 1.5 inch rod pocket - use 3/4 inch or smaller rod. 100% cotton. Machine wash cold, tumble dry low. Made in India. Matching valance and kitchen textiles available separately. These beautiful cafe curtains complement both traditional and contemporary home decor.
